name: places/ChIJ4xHQe-tZwokR_iIgN3LZ7EQ
formattedAddress: 353 W 12th St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 353 W 12th St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
My advice: STAY AWAY from any buildings they manage. We have lived in 6 other buildings during our time in NYC - this is by far the worst manager you'll ever deal with.

I have been leaving there for a bit longer than one year. I have had roaches and mice since the day I moved in... I have asked for the exterminator every month.... I saw him once.
So far, I've had to call them about 2 different issues - it takes around 3 calls to be able to get the super to come... each time the person who picked up the phone ended up shouting at me and my boyfriend. I have never had another person shout at me on the phone (or in person) and it really makes it incredibly uncomfortable. I would like to have the super come and seal a whole that has been letting mice into my apartment for the past 6 months... and i would like to do that without having to wait 6 months, calling 5 times, and getting shouted at (and threatened) by the management company.... is this much to ask?

originalText.text: If I could give no stars I would. If you read through all of the other reviews, that's the same experience I have had over the past year with my roommates. They rarely answer their phones. When I finally got ahold of them to get my super's email (we were told everything has to go through management) I emailed 3 times with no response. If you don't care about any of this, go ahead and live in their buildings. If you do, I'd advise to find a different place. Feel free to do your own research, but if you look them up on any landlord/property management search for New York, you'll see how many violations they have.

originalText.text: Just the absolute worst property management / landlord I've ever dealt with. The office staff is rude when you call and generally incompetent. They take forever to respond. This company should be sent to the farm upstate.

text.text: Just the absolute worst property management / landlord I've ever dealt with. The office staff is rude when you call and generally incompetent. They take forever to respond. This company should be sent to the farm upstate.

originalText.text: Slumlords and crooks. Those 2 words sums it all. They don't provide simple service they get paid for. They don't pay contractors to do the repairs. Friend told me they have tons of  lawsuit for unpaid repairs.  Stay away from this management.

originalText.text: Literally the worst management company. Nonresponsive, terrible at communicating, and extremely shady. DO NOT recommend them at all.
